GENRES: Visual Novel, Yuri, Hentai, Eroge
LANGUAGE: Japanese (English/Spanish Translations Available)
DEVELOPED BY: Yurin Yurin, Fuguriya
RELEASED: 2006 - 2014 (ongoing)

UPDATED (14/02/15)
LIST OF VISUAL NOVELS:

      (All ages) 

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

1: These games are only for Windows. 
   I know nothing about Sono Hanabira on Mac/Linux, I am so sorry, but I thought this links may help you. 
        <a href=" http://the.markinglifestyle.com/project/sonohana-mac/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://the.markinglifestyle.com/project/sonohana-mac/</a>
        

2: Assure you have set your system locale for non-unicode programs.  
   On Windows, go to the Control Panel > "Region and Language" ("Clock, Language, and Region" > "Change keyboards or other input methods" on Windows 7).
   Change the system locale on the Administration tab. It will need a reboot of the system.  

3: Extract each game from its .rar file (WinRAR or 7-zip).  

4: I ensured all the games were installed in their respective folders and I did not have any important problem while running any Sono Hanabira.
   If you do, there's also a text file named "Potential Problems", you may find some help in it I hope.

TRANSLATIONS

   I already did a .txt file where I explain where to find english/spanish translations.

ENJOY :D
